TestCase.name: testCoNonGroupTableValuedAggregate
TestCase.Resource: CoGroupTableValuedAggregate(coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) :- Exchange(distribution=[single]) : +- Calc(select=[l1 AS _l0, l2 AS _l1]) : +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[l1, l2]) +- Calc(select=[r1 AS _r0, r2 AS _r1, +(r1, 1) AS _r2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[r1, r2])

TestCase.name: testCoGroupTableValuedAggregateAndAs
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(k=[AS($0, 'k')], a=[AS($1, 'a')], b=[AS($2, 'b')], c=[AS($3, 'c')], d=[AS($4, 'd')], e=[AS($5, 'e')], f=[AS($6, 'f')]) +- LogicalCoTableValuedAggregate(groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) :- LogicalProject(_l0=[AS($0, '_l0')], _l1=[AS($1, '_l1')], l1=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalProject(_r0=[AS($0, '_r0')], _r1=[AS($1, '_r1')], _r2=[AS(+($0, 1), '_r2')], r1=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]])

Calc(select=[l1 AS k, f0 AS a, f1 AS b, f2 AS c, f3 AS d, f4 AS e, f5 AS f]) +- CoGroupTableValuedAggregate(groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)], groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) :- Calc(select=[l1 AS _l0, l2 AS _l1, l1]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[l1]]) : +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[l1, l2]) +- Calc(select=[r1 AS _r0, r2 AS _r1, +(r1, 1) AS _r2, r1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[r1]]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[r1, r2])

TestCase.name: testCoGroupTableValuedAggregate
TestCase.Resource: LogicalCoTableValuedAggregate(groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) :- LogicalProject(_l0=[AS($0, '_l0')], _l1=[AS($1, '_l1')], l1=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalProject(_r0=[AS($0, '_r0')], _r1=[AS($1, '_r1')], _r2=[AS(+($0, 1), '_r2')], r1=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]])

CoGroupTableValuedAggregate(groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)], groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) :- Calc(select=[l1 AS _l0, l2 AS _l1, l1]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[l1]]) : +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[l1, l2]) +- Calc(select=[r1 AS _r0, r2 AS _r1, +(r1, 1) AS _r2, r1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[r1]]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[r1, r2])

TestCase.name: testPushDownDistributionIntoCoTableValuedAgg
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(l1=[$0], TMP_0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], TMP_0=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(l1=[$0], f0=[$1]) +- LogicalCoTableValuedAggregate(groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) :- LogicalProject(_l0=[AS($0, '_l0')], _l1=[AS($1, '_l1')], l1=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalProject(_r0=[AS($0, '_r0')], _r1=[AS($1, '_r1')], _r2=[AS(+($0, 1), '_r2')], r1=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[false], groupBy=[l1], select=[l1, COUNT(f0) AS TMP_0]) +- Calc(select=[l1, f0]) +- CoGroupTableValuedAggregate(groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)], groupBy1=[l1], groupBy2=[r1], coAggApply=[TestInnerJoinFunc(_l0, _l1)(_r0, _r1, _r2)]) :- Calc(select=[l1 AS _l0, l2 AS _l1, l1]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[l1]]) : +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[l1, l2]) +- Calc(select=[r1 AS _r0, r2 AS _r1, +(r1, 1) AS _r2, r1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[r1]]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[r1, r2])
